到達目標:
Students will be able to discuss common topics in English.
Students will be able to practice idiomatic English.
特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景:
This course will take very simple conversation topics and students will practice these topics. Students will be talking for 70-80 minutes per week. The teacher will listen and highlight certain strategic and idiomatic aspects of the conversations that could be changed or improved. This course is a fluency-based course and not an accuracy-based course. The teacher will also answer specific questions raised by students.
The 2 homework tasks will be to write a dialogue based on the issues that arise in class.

第2回: Conversation topic - My favorite movies and TV programs.
第3回: Conversation topic - Shopping: habits, places, online or bricks and mortar.
第4回: Conversation topics - eating out on a budget, and splurging on a special meal.
第5回: Conversation topic - Weekend trips: places for a short trip around Japan.
第6回: Conversation topic - Day trips: museums, sightseeing spots and places to visit that are only a few hours away.
第7回: Conversation topic - Art and Culture: art, architecture, literature, fashion.
第8回: Conversation topic - Social media: how you use it, how should it be changed.
第9回: Conversation topic - Remembering high school: good and bad times.
第10回: Conversation topic - Health: are you healthy? How can you improve your health? What are your bad habits? Do you have good sleep hygiene?
第11回: Conversation topic - Part-time jobs: are they an important part of your education? What are the best and worst jobs you have heard about?
第12回: Conversation topic - Yourself: how have you changed over the last 10 years? What are some new things you are trying out?
第13回: Conversation topic - What do you want to do after university?
